document_name: 00068279 Signed Initiation Plan for Targeted support to Implement Bangladesh REDD+ Readiness Roadmap.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/BGD/00068279 Signed Initiation Plan for Targeted support to Implement Bangladesh REDD+ Readiness Roadmap.pdf

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
This initiation plan seeks to achieve the following three objectives:

1. To implement the Targeted Support activities in two focal areas: 

a. Ensuring that the initial National REDD+ Strategy in Bangladesh incorporates effective measures to address REDD+ corruption risks that fully reflect national and international requirements.

b. Ensuring that the initial National REDD+ Strategy in Bangladesh incorporates effective measures to assess and report on social impacts of REDD+ in a way that fully reflects national and international requirements.

2. To prepare a full REDD+ project document that aims to implement UNDP components of the REDD Roadmap.

3. To mobilize resources and exploring programming opportunities with Forest Department promoting sustainable forest management

project_descr: Targeted support to implement Bangladesh REDD+ Readiness
project_title: Targeted support to implement Bangladesh REDD+ Readiness
